title: Shrunken portions of the game
body: When i re-downloaded the game certain portions of it are shrunk such a the cursor, minimap, chat box and settings menu, this is frustrating because i often loose track of my cursor in the middle of battle and cant click on people to use my abilities n them

replies.body: Are you on a 4K?  It's not currently supported so you could see issues like this, especially while tabbing in and out.  Was your UI Scale/Hud adjusted through your in-game options?  This can change the size of your hud to make it appear smaller.  Otherwise, what happens if you lower your resolution in-game?  Let me know.
hud scaling was all at 100% everything is still shrunk tho
im not in 4k but even lowing graphic settings hasnt changed the size of anything ill try and see if changing the scale will change anything
